attributes.action: Create a special unit within the police to deal with zero tolerance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A unit should be created wihtin the police force that deals with serious accusations and can implement a zero tolerance approach to arresting youths/gangs or any other hostile movements without having to worry about getting court cases brought themselves. This is obviously a last resort but atleast it can be used to win the hearts and minds of our own people against crime.
